events.message: I ordered a package over two weeks ago and the tracking still shows it as shipped but not delivered. This delay is unacceptable and I need help.
The system has categorized this case under 'Delivery Delay' due to keywords related to late shipment and tracking concerns.
An agent has been assigned to handle the delayed delivery issue to provide the necessary assistance and updates.
Hello! I’m sorry to hear about the delay with your order. I'll do my best to help you find out what’s causing the hold-up.
Could you please provide me with your order number and tracking ID so I can check the shipment status in more detail?
Sure, the order number is 123456789 and the tracking code is XYZ987654321. I appreciate your help in resolving this.
After checking, it appears the shipment is delayed due to a logistics issue at the carrier. We can expedite a replacement shipment or issue a refund if you prefer.
I really need the item as soon as possible. Please send the replacement quickly; waiting for a refund would not work for me right now.
I’m escalating your case to our logistics supervisor to prioritize the replacement delivery and ensure it reaches you promptly.
The replacement package has been shipped today with expedited delivery and you should receive it within two days. Thank you for your patience.
Just checking in to confirm that you received your replacement order and that everything is satisfactory. Please let us know if further assistance is needed.
Since there has been no further reply, we are closing the case. Thank you for contacting support and have a great day!
